title: Hey @Targons Blade! Quick suggestion
body:
I see a lot of posts about the Windows 10 update causing freezing. Have you considered a quick Red Post talking about disabling the Game Bar. I also found that doing the compatibility diagnostic takes care of any problem. Might save you some time and headache!

thanks!

meow

replies.body:
Hey friend,

That's a fantastic suggestion! I definitely think we'll look at something like that in the future. I really appreciate you looking out for me and Porocles. ^.^

I'll catch you on the rift, dude!

http://imgur.com/a/Pt4nI
